name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Vinli
description: This is a repository of vinli APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Vinli
apis.description: Vinli - The easiest, most advanced connected-car system in the world. Vinli is a platform for easily and quickly building connected car apps. Apps get vehicle data through Vinli services.
